story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: NEDSWISS helps businesses across Europe grow by combining creativity and technology to build a strong digital presence.
story.paragraph2: Our experienced team delivers design, development, and marketing solutions that look great and achieve real results.
story.paragraph3: We've supported 50+ clients, from startups to enterprises, in transforming their digital presence and driving success.

values.title: Values

systemDevelopment.title: System Development
systemDevelopment.description: We build tailored systems and software that perfectly fit your business needs, such as CRM platforms, HR systems, or any custom solutions that streamline operations and improve performance.

nedx.title: SaaS CRM for Moving & Relocation – Enterprise Solution
nedx.description: NEDX CRM is a tailored SaaS platform that transforms how moving and relocation companies manage their business - from customer contact and offers to scheduling, secure payments, and financial analysis - all in one intelligent system. Revolutionizing Business Management: A tailored CRM Platform for the Moving Industry.
nedx.subtitle: Revolutionizing Business Management: A Tailored CRM Platform for Growing Enterprises

awards.title: Awards
items: 2025 Global Tech Innovation - Gold in Business Solutions
2024 Digital Excellence Award - Silver in User Experience

expertises.title: Expertises
items: Task & Employee Management with Roles & Permissions

nedx.conclusion: Built with a secure, multi-tenant architecture, NEDX CRM empowers both platform owners and moving companies to operate efficiently. Super Admins can manage subscriptions, track revenue, and monitor company performance.

nedswiss.title: NED SWISS – The All-in-One Management Platform for Modern Agencies
nedswiss.description: NED SWISS is an advanced management platform designed specifically for agencies to streamline client management, track revenues and expenses, assign employee tasks, interact with an AI assistant, and analyze profits and performance through precise dashboards and visual reports. A breakthrough in business management – everything you need in one smart system.
nedswiss.subtitle: Revolutionizing Business Management A Tailored CRM Platform for Growing Enterprises

awards.title: Awards
items: 2025 Global Tech Innovation - Gold in Business Solutions
2024 Digital Excellence Award - Silver in User Experience

expertises.title: Expertises
items: Client & Lead Management – A complete view of all customer interactions
Offer & Invoice Automation – Generate and send PDF documents with email approval workflows.
Task & Employee Management – Assign roles and permissions to ensure efficient workflows.
AI Assistant – Smart decision support for faster and better outcomes.

nedswiss.conclusion: With its robust and secure multi-tenant architecture, NED SWISS empowers both platform owners and agencies to operate with unmatched efficiency. Super Admins can manage subscriptions, track revenues, and monitor company performance, while agencies gain powerful tools to manage clients, offers, payments, and employees—all in one place.

header.title: We design and deliver cutting-edge digital experiences that empower businesses to grow, succeed, and go beyond limits.

websiteDesign.title: Graphic Design & Printing
websiteDesign.description: We create unique and impactful graphic designs that bring your brand to life, leaving a lasting impression across print, digital, and social platforms.

systemDevelopment.title: Offset Printing
systemDevelopment.description: We deliver high-quality offset printing solutions that ensure precision, consistency, and vibrant results—perfect for large volumes of magazines, catalogs, packaging, and marketing materials that elevate your brand’s presence.

businessCards.title: Promotional Business Card Design for Bella Mila Restaurant
businessCards.description: An innovative business card was designed for Bella Mila, a pizza-specialized restaurant, to serve as an effective marketing tool that goes beyond simply displaying contact information. The primary goal of the design is to encourage customers to order and boost sales by integrating an attractive promotional offer directly into the card.
businessCards.subtitle: The card includes all the information a customer needs to make a purchase decision and take advantage of the offer:

offerConditions.title: Offer Conditions
offerConditions.description:
Minimum order: CHF 30
Important note: Vouchers cannot be combined with other offers.
Expiration date: Offer valid until December 31, 2025

contactDetails.title: Contact & Ordering Information
contactDetails.description:
To redeem the offer: valid when ordering by phone.
Phone number: 056 222 01 02
Address: Bruggerstrasse 173, 5400 Baden

footer.title: Footer
footer.description: The design features a dark textured background to highlight the vibrant restaurant logo and a tempting pizza image. Red and white accents are strategically applied to emphasize the offer details and contact information, ensuring readability and making the card a memorable marketing tool in the hands of every customer.

expertises.title: Expertises
items: Task & Employee Management with Roles & Permissions

businessCards.conclusion: Built with a secure, multi-tenant architecture, NEDX CRM empowers both platform owners and moving companies to operate efficiently. Super Admins can manage subscriptions, track revenue, and monitor company performance.

footer.title: Footer
footer.description: At Coiffeur Adam it’s not just about the service itself, but about the fine details that bring out your natural beauty in the best way. Our eyebrow trimming is done with care and professionalism, giving you a balanced and elegant look while enjoying a relaxing experience in a refined atmosphere. This integrated visual design reflects our philosophy of combining quality with sophistication, allowing clients to feel luxury and attention to detail from the very first moment—even before stepping into the salon.

logo.title: Professional Presentation of the La Delizia Restaurant Logo Identity
logo.description: Main Concept: The Joy of Italian Authenticity with a Modern Touch
logo.subtitle: The name "La Delizia" means "delight" or "joy" in Italian, which perfectly captures the essence of the brand identity. The logo is designed to reflect an unforgettable dining experience, conveying a clear message: a restaurant that blends the authenticity of traditional Italian cuisine with a modern, elegant atmosphere.
logo.subtitle2: The logo is built upon three core elements that work together to form a strong and distinctive identity:

items.title: 1. Artistic Italian Flag
items.description: Brushstroke style instead of a rigid flag. Symbolizes passion, creativity, and authenticity—each dish as a crafted piece of art.

items.title: 2. Smart Typography Duo
items.description:
La Delizia: Modern, lowercase sans-serif → elegance, simplicity, and approachability.
Pizzeria – Ristorante: Classic serif → tradition, heritage, and credibility.

footer.title: Integrated Message
footer.description: The logo blends tradition and modernity: authentic Italian flavors, presented with elegance and quality, creating a joyful and memorable dining experience.

logo.conclusion: With its robust and secure multi-tenant architecture, NED SWISS empowers both platform owners and agencies to operate with unmatched efficiency. Super Admins can manage subscriptions, track revenues, and monitor company performance, while agencies gain powerful tools to manage clients, offers, payments, and employees—all in one place.

header.title: We illuminate your brand with cutting-edge signage solutions and stunning 3D installations that capture attention and create lasting impressions.

signageSolutions.title: Illuminated Signage Solutions
signageSolutions.description: We create vibrant, eye-catching illuminated signs that enhance your brand visibility 24/7, combining innovative lighting technology with superior craftsmanship.

installations.title: 3D Installations
installations.description: We design and install stunning three-dimensional displays that transform spaces, creating immersive experiences that engage customers and elevate your brand presence.

led.title: Advanced LED Signage Systems
led.description: Our LED signage solutions combine energy efficiency with brilliant illumination, offering programmable displays that adapt to your marketing needs with stunning visual impact.
led.subtitle: Why Choose Our LED Solutions:

features.title: Key Features & Benefits
items: Energy-efficient LED technology with up to 80% power savings
Programmable color-changing displays for dynamic messaging
Remote control capabilities for easy content management

applications.title: Perfect Applications
applications.description: Ideal for storefronts, shopping centers, restaurants, hotels, and corporate buildings seeking maximum visibility and modern appeal.

footer.description: Our LED systems are designed for longevity and performance, backed by comprehensive warranties and professional installation services.

neon.title: Custom Neon & Flex Sign Solutions
neon.description: We create stunning neon and LED flex signs that capture the classic appeal of traditional neon while offering modern efficiency and versatility for any design concept.
neon.subtitle: The Perfect Blend of Classic and Modern:

features.title: What Makes Our Neon Special
items: Traditional glass neon and modern LED flex options
Custom shapes and designs for unique brand expression
Continuous lighting with smooth, even illumination

applications.title: Ideal For
applications.description: Perfect for restaurants, bars, retail stores, entertainment venues, and any business wanting that distinctive neon glow and vintage aesthetic.

footer.description: Our neon solutions combine artistic craftsmanship with technical precision to create signs that become landmark features of your business.

threed.title: Professional 3D Installation Solutions
threed.description: Transform Your Space with Dimensional Impact
threed.subtitle: We create three-dimensional installations that add depth, texture, and visual interest to any environment, making your brand impossible to ignore.
threed.subtitle2: Our 3D installation process encompasses three critical phases:

items.title: Dimensional Letters & Logos
items.description: Precision-cut letters with LED backlighting or face illumination for maximum brand impact.

items.title: Architectural Integration
items.description: Seamless integration with building facades and interior spaces for cohesive design.

items.title: Interactive Elements
items.description: Motion-activated and touch-responsive installations that engage customers actively.

footer.title: End-to-End Service
footer.description: From initial concept and 3D modeling to fabrication and professional installation, we handle every aspect of your 3D signage project with precision and expertise.

header.title: We create digital experiences that inspire people, strengthen brands, and help businesses grow with confidence

websiteDesign.title: Website Design
websiteDesign.description: We craft modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites that reflect your brand and deliver seamless digital experiences across all devices.

seo.title: From Distinction to Power This is Your Brand’s Journey
seo.description: In today’s crowded market, how can you make sure you’re not just another option?
seo.subtitle: At NED SWISS, we don’t just help you stand out. We build with you a strong and influential brand that gives you the power to grow and dominate.

stageOne.title: Stage One: Distinction:
stageOne.description: We start here with you: helping you stand out from competitors—just like the bright red balloon in a sky full of shadows. Through strong visual identity and strategy, we make your brand visible and unique. But distinction isn’t the final goal… it’s just the beginning.

stageTwo.title: Stage Two: Power
stageTwo.description: We take your brand from being just a colorful balloon to becoming the “king” that dominates the chessboard.    At NED SWISS, we don’t just help you stand out. We build    with you a strong and influential brand that gives you the    power to grow and dominate. The design balances a modern background with striking visuals of the featured product. Carefully placed color accents enhance readability of the offer and call-to-action, creating a promotional piece that is both stylish and impactful.

seo.conclusion: Built with a secure, multi-tenant architecture, NEDX CRM empowers both platform owners and moving companies to operate efficiently. Super Admins can manage subscriptions, track revenue, and monitor company performance.

socialMedia.title: The Three Dimensional Traffic Light Strategy:
socialMedia.description: The Three Dimensional Traffic Light Strategy is a powerful approach to digital marketing that helps businesses grow and dominate their market. It combines three key elements: content creation, community management, and paid ads, to create a comprehensive and effective marketing strategy.
socialMedia.subtitle: At NED SWISS, we don’t just manage accounts—we drive their success. The German word “Steuern” means management, leadership, guidance, and control all at once. Just like an intelligent traffic light system that organizes the busiest intersections, we implement a strategic system that transforms chaos into a streamlined flow of results.

stageOne.title: Yellow Light: Prepare & Optimize
stageOne.description: Create content, design visuals, target precisely, and test for best results.

stageTwo.title: Green Light: Execute & Drive
stageTwo.description: Launch campaigns, manage ads, engage audiences, and drive traffic to your website or store.

paidAds.title: In a crowded world, don’t wait for opportunities... Build your own path to them
paidAds.description: Many brands have strong products and services, yet get lost in the noise of the digital space. Reaching the right customer doesn’t have to be a long or uncertain process. With Paid Ads, you can connect directly and efficiently.At NED SWISS, we build this path in three structured step
paidAds.subtitle: At NED SWISS, we build this path in three structured steps:
paidAds.subtitle2: Strategic Planning Market research and precise audience targeting. Creative Execution Campaigns across Google, Meta, LinkedIn, and TikTok with impactful visuals and messaging. Continuous Optimization Real time monitoring, A/B testing, and data driven adjustments for maximum results

keyBenefits.title: Key Benefits
items: Accurate targeting with efficient budget use.
Full control over message and spending.
Bright accent colors are used sparingly against a neutral backdrop to guide the viewer’s eye toward the offer details and contact points.

PrivacyConsent.title: Privacy & Data Collection
PrivacyConsent.description: We collect basic visitor data (country, session duration) to improve our services. This helps us understand our audience and enhance your experience.
